title: Worth the money
text: everything within the hotel was chicly thought out and amazingly designed.

title: Providing the best of service, seamlessly.
text:
This is my second stay at a W hotel.  A few months ago, I stayed at the W on the Bund in Shanghai and on the basis of my fabulous experience, there, I booked into the W in Taipei and was so glad that I did.
Of course, the W hotels are modern and have fabulous rooms with great views over the city.  You wish you didn't have to leave the hotel - and wish that you didn't have to go to do all of those touristy things - because the staff provide you with the absolute highest levels of service.   The Reception staff provided a solution to a booking issue and did that seamlessly.  Nothing was too much trouble - from sorting out this problem to buying concert tickets for a show the very next night....and the tickets were delivered to the hotel within hours.

title: Mrs
text: We just walk-in and was given a royal treatment like an old guest.
comfort and convenience

title: Great location and a modern hotel
text: Location is great, walking distance to Taipei 101 tower and central shopping areas. It is right by subway station too. Hotel itself is modern, service staff  are nice and warm. The Cons is it is kind of nosie at the lobby and the whole atmosphere is a little bit too energetic.

title: My new favorite hotel in Taiwan
text: The service at the W is just absolutely impressive. I felt like a true 5-star guest. On top of that the food, decor, everything is very stylish - fun - and high quality. Will gladly stay here again.

title: Good location with standard services
text: The facilities are well maintained and the service is good as standard.  The towers were not dry enough after washing and they had bad smell.

title: Reconnect to the ‘W’ way of life.
text: The W Hotel, Taipei has well and truly reconnected me to the ‘W’ brand (actually the W way of life really). Super friendly, helpful and efficient staff is the key to this place. As a guest, you are made to feel relaxed though you always know assistance is only a phone call away should it be needed (and I mean a SINGLE call). Just a great place to enjoy a relaxed, fun, exciting yet still productive stay in this mega city of Taipei.

title: Can’t go wrong w W Taipei.
text:
Clean nice rooms. 
Incredible spa. 
Incredible breakfast. 
Convenient location.

title: Great weekend stay at W Taipei
text: Great hotel, spacious room with super comfortable bed, plus awesome location near tons of shopping, restaurants and bus station (Taipei City Hall) if you're heading out for day trips. Only downside was having to take 2 elevators to get up to your room, the first to reception on 10FL, then another to your room. Oh, and best beef noodles I've had in Taipei via room service :-).

title: Party or Sleep - your choice
text: This is the second time I have stayed here and there have been people partying in rooms near mine, music full blast.  I slept 2 hours total.  This is a hotel, primarily but it seems to be a place for people to party most of all.

title: Awesome Taipei experience
text: We stayed in a King Suite and it was fantastic. One of our best hotel stays ever. Everything is top notch at the W Taipei. Bummer was the Owl Bar was closed for remodeling and that is what they are famous for. The pool was excellent and I highly recommend the buffet breakfast, it was out of this world with flavors from all around the world and in a beautiful setting. Pool was also great. Location is great, right next to amazing shopping and food as well as Taipei 101. W Taipei is fancy but kid friendly as well.

title: Everything you’d expect from a true 5*
text: Can’t really fault the W Taipei - modern comfortable rooms, great shower and bath tub, great location right above the subway, the service is just right. Signature W touches everywhere. Everything you would expect from a large 5-star hotel.
Love they ungraded me to the view with 101 Buildng and higher floor. Great service!

title: Wonderful Mood
text: Unique n wonderful mood

title: Two Nights in Taipei
text: Amaxing location (20 minutes from Songshan Airport) and in the middle of Xinyi district. Great service and new rooms.

title: High service level, funky decoration
text: Amazing funky decoration and very high level of service. Everything you need at a five star Hotel - orangised staff and clean

title: Hotel is 10 mins walk to 101 & above blue linenMRT
text: Stay was good. Place is clean n directly above a train station. About 10-15 mins walk to Taipei 101 but loads of Malls around the hotel. But if u are looking for cheap local food, perhaps this place is not your Choice. This W hotel room is not as big as the other W hotel. The toilet is decent size.

title: 최악의 호텔
text:
최악입니다
Deposit 환불 안된지 벌써 한달 반 넘구요
그 사이에 전화 열통 넘게 매번 새로 설명하고
이메일은 답도 없어요
결국 호텔스닷컴에서 이주전에 연락해줬지만
아직도 환불 전. 보다보다 처음 봤어요. 
5성 호텔이라고 볼수 없는 최악의 서비스
현지에서 저녁 회식도 있어서 결제만 천만원이 넘는데 현장에서는 뭐라도 다 해줄듯이 말만 하라더니
이 응대 기 막혀서 말도 안나오는데
아무런 보상도 해줄수 없다하고 아직도 사과도 안합니다. 최악이예요

title: 모녀의 짧은 대만여행
text:
백화점과 지하철과 연결되어있어 비가 올때도 편리하게 이용하였습니다. 3명이 더블베드 룸에서 지냈는데 꽤 여유로웠습니다. 다만 화장실이 미닫이 문이어서 이용하는데 조심해야합니다. 부주의로 손가락을 다쳐 이부분이 아쉽고 어린이들은 조심해야할 것 같습니다.
조식도 가격에 비해 민족스럽고 이틀 이용하였는데 메뉴도 조금씩 변해서 좋았습니다. 모든 직원들이 영어를 유창히 구사하고 서비스도 좋았습니다.
여행 전반적으로 비가 왔었는데 호텔 덕분에 만족스럽게 대만 여행을 할 수 있었습니다. 가격이 비싸지만 그만큼 위치가 좋기 때문에 편의성을 생각한다면 괜찮은 선택이라고 생각합니다.

text:

エステは近未来的な感じです。クラシックで落ち着いた感じの場所で施術してほしかったので、今回はトライしませんでした。

text: 위치는 매우 훌륭하나 룸 컨디션이 좋지 않았는데 각종 집기류들이 중고처럼 스크레치, 찍힘 으로 보기 좋지 않았고 나무 문이 고장나 있어 문 결고 닫는데 어려웠으며 세면대 위생상태가 좋지 않아 머리카락 이물이 있었다

title: 대만 시내서 가장 완벽한 숙소!
text: 주변 접근성도 좋고, 호텔 시설도 대만족! 직원들도 다 영어를 잘하고 매우 친절해서 돈이 아깝지 않다고 생각됐음!

title: ファンタスティックスイート
text:
予約時はマーベラススイートの部屋を予約しましたが、当日ファンタスティックスイートの部屋にアップグレードして頂きました。
部屋は広く、内装もお洒落で、台北101が部屋から良く見える素晴らしい展望でした！
スイート特典でバーで使えるハッピーアワーチケットとボトルの赤ワインとお菓子を頂きました。
ハッピーアワーチケットは決められた時間とメニューの中からドリンクを、頂けます。
次回もうワンランク上のWOWスイートに泊まってみたいです！

title: とても快適でした！
text: 最上階にアップグレードして頂き、非常に快適でした。ありがとうございます！
직원 모두 친절합니다. 서비스도 좋구요. 아쉬운 점이 잇다면 밤에 수영장 운영을 안하는게 슬펏습니다.

title: ベッドは最高ですね
text:
場所はいいですね
なんといってもベッドがいいですね。ここは快眠できますよ
高級デパートも近いのでなんでも買い物には困りませんでした、

title: 힙하고 핫하고 세심하게 배려한 호텔
text:
서비스 좋고 
사우나,수영장,피트니스 연결이 세심하게 돋보이는 호텔,
주변은 한국의 삼성동 느낌의 거리입니다. 깨끗한 명품거리와
금융회사 빌딩이 즐비합니다.
타이난 역 주변은 명동느낌이고
그 끝자락은 신도시 느낌으로 크고깨끗한 빌딩 사이로 w호텔이 있습니다.

title: Bra beliggenhet og god mat.
text: Flott hotell med sentral beliggenhet. Frokost og lunsj buffé var imponerende. Prøv også bassenget.
酒店地點方便，門口及大堂等員工親切，本來一切很舒適理想，可惜房間清潔不理想，房間洗手間一些地方甚至完全沒有清潔過，又棄丟客人東西...失望. 希望酒店會改善

title: 非常满意的酒店
text: 酒店地点非常放便，离开地铁站只是咫尺，附近很多百货公司和购物地点。酒店员工非常友善，服务很有水准.

title: 第一印象是最重要的
text: Check-in等待太久，給客人留下不好的第一印象。房間隔音設備不足，街上的活動聲音太大。房內電燈開關制太多太複雜，電視搖控制反應遲鈍！

本身w hotel在其他國家或地方均有一種很premium的感覺，但台北的無論酒店的大小，大堂，房間裝修也令人被失望的，例如房間的空調，隔塵網應該很久沒有清理過 因為我和太太一進房間的時候，鼻敏感就不停發作，在大堂也有這個情況 。另外房間的遙控是不能運作的這也是一種低級錯誤吧....差不多三千港元一晚，很不值。
不過除此之外 那裏的服務人員態度一流， 酒店位置易極好，健身房比一般的五星酒店也可以算是ok
response_body:
親愛的Lik Hang Reno您好，

歡迎您蒞臨台北W飯店，非常感謝您撥冗為我們留下您的寶貴評論！

我們非常注重任何一位客人的回饋，希望能讓每一位客人都能獲得如家一般極致舒適的感受。很遺憾得知在您入住期間，我們提供的服務未能滿足您的預期，您在留言中所提及的空調與遙控，也會立即反應給相關部門。

我們將持續調整、進步，以期飯店能優化更舒適整潔的住房體驗給您，希望未來還有機會再次見到您蒞臨台北W飯店，我們將致力為您帶來一段美好的W體驗！

title: 十分良好的酒店。一定會再次入住
text:
我和老婆入住時酒店 因為想午睡，但原來有音樂活動在附近，房間有一點音樂，酒店職員立刻跟進，幫我們換房間，十分貼心

還有酒店知道我們是剛剛結婚，送上小禮物。真的十分貼心~~~

因為我們的電話是iphone x 所以沒有音源線，所以第一天用不到房間的音響，第二天酒店的客服就說幫我想想辦法，晚上就有音源線在桌上，服務真的真的很好

酒店的附近有很多商店可以逛。十分好。一定會再次入住
一流！
Bath towels some of them are light grey, disgusting!! Poor hygiene

text: If you are in Taipei , you really don’t want to miss this hotel. Great service , great location . A good mix of business and leisure . My favorite hotel in Taipei.

Free upgrade to the Wow Suite, which truly was Wow. However, in-room dining was slow, french fries spilled into beef noodle soup, missing items, etc. Housecleaning needs to dust higher areas of the room as well...
The room was ok, the breakfast was disappointed.

title: Luxury, comfort, excellent location
text: Really nice modern hotel with a nice spa located in the center of new part of Taipei.  We were on the 24th floor with a nice view. The hotel staff were very professional and helpful.

title: Food hygiene lacking
text: We found a hair in our food. It look like a pubic hair and it freaked out my Wife who was eating the beef noodles.

title: 5 stars to W
text: I check out of W Taipei and check In to Le Meridian Taipei, both hotel claim to be 4.5-5 stars, room rates are similar, but the service was tereible in Le Meridian. My family checked into Le Meridian with a very unfriendly front desk staff. I pay extra to upgrade to Business suite in both hotels.  I compare rooms with W Taipei, room decorations, size and views are not comparable to each other.  While waiting for the room to be ready, my family decided to go to lunch on the 2nd floor, just as I almost finished my lunch a large piece of human nails was in my bow of rice, I immediately feel like to throw up, make a complaint to the waitress, non of the management level personal come to comfort my family, nothing was compensated, very disappointed with Le Meridians.  For the amount of money I spend W Taipei would be my choice again.
New hotel. Excellent location and the breakfast buffet is so good!
